stripped_text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
Tap, discard a Fire site > You may move one step. Cast Firebolts for Free.
stripped_type_line: Your Avatar of desire and destruction.
text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
Tap, discard a Fire site > You may move one step. Cast Firebolts for Free.
title: Avatar of Fire

stripped_text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
You gain +1 attack power for each nearby Earth site.
text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
You gain +1 [attack_power] for each nearby Earth site.
title: Avatar of Earth

stripped_text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
Once on your turn, if You are on a Wind site, You may fly to a nearby site.
stripped_type_line: Your Avatar of knowledge and power.
text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
Once on your turn, if You are on a Wind site, You may fly to a nearby site.
title: Avatar of Wind

stripped_text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
You may move to Water sites You play.
The site You are on is also a Water site.
stripped_type_line: Your Avatar of charm and trickery.
text:
Tap > Play or draw a site.
You may move to Water sites You play.
The site You are on is also a Water site.
title: Avatar of Water
